title: Chennai Anthem by Simbu Vanthaarai Vazhavaikum Ooru Lyrics Mathil Mel Poonai
stanzas:
Singer: : Simbu
Music : Ganesh Ragavendra
Movie: Mathil Mel Poonai



Vanthaarai vaazhavaikum ooru
aaduna aappu vaikum paaru
olachaaka soru podum ooru..
adichu nee mela mela yaeru

machi valathu kaala vachi, vanangi vaada machi
thuppuraanda mela echi

machi nammaku venaam katchi
vaangi vaada bajji
paaka povom pagal kaatchi

Vanthaarai vaazhavaikum ooru
aaduna aappu vaikum paaru … machi …
olachaaka soru podum ooru..
adichu nee mela mela yaeru

Indha ooru peoples ellam
nallavanga naalum therinjavanga
sondha bandham yethum illa
aana paasakaara payapullanga..

Figure pesum english vaarthai
oru elavum puriyalaye
namma ooru english teacher,
sariyaaga padikalaye

aadu aadu oodu oodu,paadu paadu kondaadu
koodu koodu thaedu theadu naalum kuthaadu

podu podu podu podu kaadu karuvaadu
naadu naadu moodu moodu 
kaathula parakuthu panpaadu

Vanthaarai vaazhavaikum ooru
aaduna aappu vaikum paaru 

Enga suthi ada enga vandhom
manda kaanji pochu ada mudiyalada
kaiyula kaasu theerum munnae
oora paathu poi seranuda

Ena petha mummy daddy intha ooril porakalaye
cowboy jeans pottu maadu maeika mudiyalaye

cellu cellu billu billu kallu kallu sengalu
mullu mullu kallu mullu engum housefull-u

nillu nillu vellu vellu dhille dhille kuraiyathe
sollu sollu thillu thillu mullu kotaiyil neeyum kudiyeru

Vanthaarai vaazhavaikum ooru
aaduna aappu vaikum paaru
olachaaka soru podum ooru..
adichu nee mela mela yaeru
